Package shared.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateKeyException  
    GameInitializationException
    Occurs when an error happens during the initialization of the game.
    GamePersistenceException
    Occurs when a game is unable to be saved or loaded
    InsufficientResourcesException
    An exception representing an action being unable to take place due to something lacking the resources to do so.
    InvalidActionException
    A general exception that occurs when a player is trying to perform an illegal action.
    JoinGameException
    An exception that occurs when a user cannot join a game.
    NameAlreadyInUseException
    Occurs when the user tries to register with a username that is already registered to another user.
    NotYourTurnException
    Occurs when a player attempts to perform a turn-specific action when it is not their turn.
    SchemaMismatchException  
    ServerException
    Occurs when an error occurs on the server.
    TradeException
    Occurs when one player attempts to trade more resources than he has available to offer.
    UserException
    An exception that occurs when the user has invalid information
